strapiPost.title: Nabholz Presents A Night Of Fun And Fundraising At The Amazeum's Ungala
strapiPost.content:
Release your inner kid, eat, drink, and raise money for a great cause at the Scott Family Amazeum's UnGala, an annual FUNdraiser for ages 21+ where you can experience unique activities designed to spark creativity and curiosity, on Apr 21, from 6-10p.

  • Hungry for fun: Satisfy your hunger with the all-you-can-eat food truck buffet and mad-scientist cocktails, then feed your need for speed in a souped-up, 24-volt racer and enjoy other hands-on activities like pewter casting, screen printing, and more.
  • Fun money: The UnGala supports the Amazeum's nonprofit mission to host Priceless Nights, keep general admission cost low, and provide professional development opportunities for local educators.

Reserve your tickets HERE and tell your friends!
